name: use-orientation
description: Tracks the window's current media query.
title: guara hooks

properties.name: There
properties.description: is no props for this hook.

features.title: SSR & Initial Value
bullets: The hook defaults to 'portrait' if window is not available (e.g., during SSR).
On the client, the initial value reflects the current orientation.

features.title: State Updates
bullets: The hook updates its state immediately on mount and whenever the device orientation changes.
Uses the change event on window.matchMedia('(orientation: portrait)') for real-time updates.

features.title: Browser Compatibility
bullets: Uses addEventListener / removeEventListener if available, otherwise falls back to addListener / removeListener for older browsers.

features.title: Cleanup
bullets: The event listener is removed automatically when the component unmounts.

features.title: Return Value
bullets: The hook returns a string: either 'portrait' or 'landscape' .

features.title: Caveats & Best Practices
bullets: The hook is intended for use in the browser; on the server, it will always return 'portrait' .
Works for both mobile and desktop browsers that support the orientation media query.
If you need to support environments without window.matchMedia , consider a fallback.
